session_info.name: FRYAA - Plenary Invited Oral Presentation (Synchrotron Light Sources and FELs)

papers.title: An Overview of Light Source Development in Asia
authors: This talk should cover the history of light sources that have been constructed

are now in operation or planned for the future in Asia. Advances in accelerator physics and technological innovations leading to steadily increasing machine performance and photon beam properties should be discussed.
